blog.description: Welcome to the void. It is filled with the wreckage of a thousand fandoms and the occasional doodle under the "my art" tag. Will be indefinitely screaming about fandom until the end of time. Starting a blog.

summary: MCU Headcanon #13
body:
MCU Headcanon #13

Steve watches Jeopardy with Tony and Bruce and, although he can’t compete with the two, he learns a lot about the modern world from watching it with them.

summary: Life after
title: Life after
body:
by Peterparkourrr

After suffering HYDRA’s abuse for far too long and watching two children he’d grown to love as his own endure torture too inhumane to imagine, Bucky seizes an opportunity to escape - and take them with him - together they travel miles to a place they hope will soon be home.

Not a sequel to “Children of HYDRA” but in a similar universe ish. Basically I had no new ideas so I’m jsut milking the fics I already have for new stories :/

Words: 5109, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

blog.name: ao3feed-stony
blog.title: Tony Stark/Steve Rogers
blog.description: stony ao3 fan fic rss feed

summary: take my sweater
title: take my sweater
body:
by Emmeline_Arden

Tony was always cold. He wore long-sleeved, too-big sweatshirts when he could get away with it, because he could cover his hands and hide his bruises and scars beneath the soft fabric, and his suits for Howard’s social events were fur-lined, so he wouldn’t start shaking with chills in the middle of a party. That would be showing weakness, and weaknesses were forbidden.

He couldn’t sleep. He tried, but he woke up from nightmares of drowning, or sometimes falling from high in the sky, and he always woke up chilled to the bone. He couldn’t sleep, but Starks are made of iron, so he applied makeup liberally and pushed through the exhaustion.

No matter what he does, he can’t feel anything from his soulmate but a deep, crushing pain in his ribs that didn’t leave with his own pain, and a cold that no blanket can ever warm.

Words: 870, Chapters: 1/10, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel, Iron Man (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Captain America (Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Pepper Potts, Howard Stark, Obadiah Stane, Edwin Jarvis, Jarvis (Iron Man movies), Ho Yinsen
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark, Pepper Potts & Tony Stark, Tony Stark & Avengers Team
  • Additional Tags: Hurt/Comfort, Howard Stark’s A+ Parenting, Howard Stark’s Bad Parenting, Self-Harm, Drinking, Alcohol Abuse/Alcoholism, Implied/Referenced Drug Use, Therapy, Alternate Universe - Soulmates, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Starks are Made of Iron, Howard Stark sucks, seriously, and tony needs help, soulmates are real fun when you can only feel each other’s pain, Based on a Tumblr Post, Fluff, hopefully fluff someday, For now though, Angst, and, Platonic Cuddling


source http://archiveofourown.org/works/19391044

That would be showing weakness, and weaknesses were forbidden.

He couldn’t sleep. He tried, but he woke up from nightmares of drowning, or sometimes falling from high in the sky, and he always woke up chilled to the bone. He couldn’t sleep, but Starks are made of iron, so he applied makeup liberally and pushed through the exhaustion.

No matter what he does, he can’t feel anything from his soulmate but a deep, crushing pain in his ribs that didn’t leave with his own pain, and a cold that no blanket can ever warm.

Words: 870, Chapters: 1/10, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel, Iron Man (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Captain America (Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Pepper Potts, Howard Stark, Obadiah Stane, Edwin Jarvis, Jarvis (Iron Man movies), Ho Yinsen
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark, Pepper Potts & Tony Stark, Tony Stark & Avengers Team
  • Additional Tags: Hurt/Comfort, Howard Stark’s A+ Parenting, Howard Stark’s Bad Parenting, Self-Harm, Drinking, Alcohol Abuse/Alcoholism, Implied/Referenced Drug Use, Therapy, Alternate Universe - Soulmates, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Starks are Made of Iron, Howard Stark sucks, seriously, and tony needs help, soulmates are real fun when you can only feel each other’s pain, Based on a Tumblr Post, Fluff, hopefully fluff someday, For now though, Angst, and, Platonic Cuddling

summary: MCU Headcanon #12
body:
MCU Headcanon #12

Peter kept the Hello Kitty pajama pants Tony gave him in the back of his closet as a reminder that he is Spider-Man, not the suit. After Tony’s death, he pulls them on, clutching his suit to his chest and cries his eyes out, wishing the he wasn’t Spider-Man and it was just his suit.
